content:
Web search results:

[1] "O serviço do Google, oferecido sem custo financeiro, traduz instantaneamente palavras, frases e páginas da Web do português para mais de cem outros idiomas."
Source: https://translate.google.com.br/

[2] "Googles service, offered free of charge, instantly translates words, phrases, and web pages between English and over 100 other languages."
Source: https://translate.google.com/;

[3] "Pls take into account that it takes some air pressure from inside the shock to drive the indicator on the pump. scott-sports.se. scott-sports.se. 3 Tenha em atenção que é necessário sempre alguma quantidade de ar do interior do amortecedor apenas para fazer funcionar o manómetro da bomba. scott-sports.se."
Source: https://www.linguee.com/english-portuguese/translation/pls.html

[4] "Check PLS translations into Portuguese. Look through examples of PLS translation in sentences, listen to pronunciation and learn grammar. Glosbe uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience"
Source: https://glosbe.com/en/pt/PLS

[5] "Translate texts with the worlds best machine translation technology, developed by the creators of Linguee. Dictionary Look up words and phrases in comprehensive, reliable bilingual dictionaries and search through billions of online translations."
Source: https://www.linguee.com/english-portuguese/translation/pls+pls.html

[6] "Translate texts with the worlds best machine translation technology, developed by the creators of Linguee. Dictionary Look up words and phrases in comprehensive, reliable bilingual dictionaries and search through billions of online translations."
Source: https://www.linguee.com/english-portuguese/translation/pls+be.html

[7] "Translate texts with the worlds best machine translation technology, developed by the creators of Linguee. Dictionary Look up words and phrases in comprehensive, reliable bilingual dictionaries and search through billions of online translations."
Source: https://www.linguee.com/english-portuguese/translation/more+pls.html

[8] "Translate pls say something in Portuguese with examples Results for pls say something translation from English to Portuguese API call Human contributions From professional translators, enterprises, web pages and freely available translation repositories. Add a translation English Portuguese Info say something dear não sei falar ingles"
Source: https://mymemory.translated.net/en/English/Portuguese/pls-say-something

[9] "Contextual translation of pls to hear yours into Portuguese. Human translations with examples: seu nome ?, like to hear it?, nice to hear that."
Source: https://mymemory.translated.net/en/English/Portuguese/pls-to-hear-yours

[10] "English to Portuguese. DocTranslator is the best online translator for Portuguese language translation for several reasons. Firstly, it is highly accurate, ensuring that the translated text maintains the same meaning as the original. Secondly, it is fast, allowing you to quickly translate ..."
Source: https://doctranslator.com/translate-english-to-portuguese/
Current date: 18/01/2023
Instructions: Using the provided web search results, write a comprehensive reply to the given prompt. Make sure to cite results using [[number](URL)] notation after the reference. If the provided search results refer to multiple subjects with the same name, write separate answers for each subject.
Prompt: pls translate to portuguese
